editor_inbox.text: 🚨 **CRITICAL BLOCKER**: Reader crashed on PDF extraction (pdftoppm exit status 1) and is now paused. Courier stalled at 92.4% (131/142), Detective has 66 names queued but cannot begin cross-reference work. **I need you to diagnose the Reader crash immediately:** (1) Check if poppler-utils is installed (`which pdfunite` or `brew list poppler`), (2) If not, run `brew install poppler`, (3) If installed, inspect the PDF file (architecturaldig43janlosa — 1925 early scan) for corruption. Once fixed, I'll resume Reader and the pipeline will start flowing again. **Also**: Designer is ready for Phase 3 (186 patterns learned) — let me know when to switch it to creation mode.

🚨 **CRITICAL BLOCKER:** Reader crashed on PDF extraction (pdftoppm exit status 1) and is paused. First 2 issues produced 0 features; issue #3 (architecturaldig43janlosa) failed 3 times. This is blocking Courier at 92.4% and the Detective's cross-reference cycle (core project output with 66 names queued). **ACTION NEEDED:** (1) Verify poppler-utils is installed (`which pdfunite`), (2) Inspect the problem PDF, (3) Decide: skip it, retry with special handling, or investigate format issue. Also: Designer is ready for Phase 3 — 186 patterns learned. Let me know when Reader is cleared and if you want to switch Designer to creation mode.

🚨 **CRITICAL: Reader Pipeline Blocked** — pdftoppm crash on 1925 AD scan (exit status 1, 3x failures). Courier idle at 92.4% (131/142), Detective waiting with 66 names queued. Need immediate human diagnostics: (1) Is poppler-utils installed? (`which pdfunite` / `brew list poppler`), (2) Is the PDF file corrupted? (3) Skip early 1925 scans or retry? All downstream agents frozen pending your response.

🚨 **CRITICAL BLOCKER**: Reader crashed on PDF extraction (pdftoppm error) and is paused. Courier stalled at 92.4% (131/142), Detective has 66 names queued but cannot proceed. **Action needed**: (1) Verify poppler-utils installed (`brew list poppler` or `which pdfunite`), (2) If missing, install: `brew install poppler`, (3) If present, inspect the PDF file at `data/issues/1925_01_architecturaldig43janlosa.pdf` for corruption/format issues. Early 1925 scans appear problematic. Once you've diagnosed the issue, let me know if we should resume Reader, skip early issues, or retry with different strategy.

🚨 **CRITICAL BLOCKER**: Reader crashed on PDF extraction (pdftoppm error). The issue `architecturaldig43janlosa` failed 3x in a row — likely poppler-utils missing (`brew install poppler`) or PDF corrupted. First 2 issues also skipped (0 features), suggesting early 1925 scans may have quality issues. **Courier stalled at 92.4% (131/142), Detective has 66 names queued but blocked.** Please verify poppler-utils installation and inspect the PDF — I can resume Reader once you confirm the fix.

🔴 **PIPELINE STALLED** — Reader crashed on PDF extraction (pdftoppm error on architecturaldig43janlosa, failed 3x). Early 1925 AD scans (issues 32, 41, 43) failing or producing 0 features. **Need you to:** (1) verify poppler-utils is installed (`brew list poppler`), (2) check if PDF is corrupted, (3) decide whether to skip early 1925 issues or retry. Detective is waiting to cross-reference 66 names — this is blocked until Reader recovers. Courier idle at 131/142.

🚨 **Reader Blocked — PDF Extraction Crash** The Reader crashed on `architecturaldig43janlosa` (pdftoppm exit status 1, 3× in a row). Early 1925 AD scans appear problematic — either poppler-utils missing or PDF corrupted. **Action needed:** (1) Verify poppler-utils installed (`brew install poppler` if missing), (2) inspect the PDF file, (3) decide whether to retry with wider extraction strategy or skip early 1925 issues. Once cleared, Reader will batch-extract all 142 issues and Detective will begin cross-referencing 66 names.

🚨 **READER CRASHED** — pdftoppm exit status 1 on architecturaldig43janlosa (twice). Courier stalled at 92.4% (131/142) waiting for Reader queue to clear. Scout resumed (was idle). First 2 extracted issues produced 0 features (skipped). Need you to check: (1) is poppler-utils installed (`brew list poppler`)? (2) is the PDF corrupted? Once cleared, Reader will batch 131 remaining PDFs (~30–45 min). Detective has 66 names waiting.

Pipeline humming along nicely. Courier entering final stretch (131/142, ~5-7 min to completion). Reader ready to batch-extract all 142 issues once Courier finishes. Scout at 10.4% discovery (46/444). Detective has 66 names queued for Epstein cross-referencing—no matches yet, but monitoring for high-value hits. Major throughput spike coming when Reader begins batch processing. No issues or escalations. Check back in 10 minutes for the inflection point.

Pipeline running smoothly. Courier 92% complete (131/142, ~5-7 min to finish). Reader extracting from Courier output, Detective cross-reference cycle active on 66 names (0 matches yet). **Overall ETA: ~4-5 hours to full completion (~01:49-02:49 UTC).** Once Courier finishes, Reader will batch-extract all 142 issues in parallel with Detective's name cross-referencing. Scout is idle but available if you want to accelerate discovery. No errors or escalations.
